Sentencas: This article investigates an innovative concept of vehicle propulsion.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: An electric vehicle with limited battery packs is coupled with an innovative converter a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell with gas turbines system (SOFC-GT).
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: This energy integrated converter is characterized by high energetic efficiency - around 70%, which includes also the integrated on board fuel reforming.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: Thus, the concept presents the advantage to extend the vehicle basic electric range thanks to this highly efficient converter.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: A second advantage is the reforming of a liquid fuel on board.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: Thus the H-2 storage is avoided.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: The liquid fuel is methane produced from biomass and liquefied at 200 bars pressure in the vehicle tank.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: The vehicle concept is modeled under Matlab/Simulink as a serial range extender.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: The innovative conversion system of the integrated reforming, SOFC and gas turbines modules (GT) is modeled with a map based approach.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: The range extender is so introduced into a standard electric vehicle.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: The innovative range extender vehicle is thus optimized according to techno-economic and environmental criteria.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender

Sentencas: The optimization is performed on the vehicle for optimal mobility service.
Titulo: Environomic design for electric vehicles with an integrated solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit as a range extender
